desc: The Box Detox is a holistic approach to vaginal health all of our products are made of 100% herbs and they aid in getting rid of vaginal odor, reoccurring bacteria and more.

layout.text: The Box Detox is a holistic approach to vaginal health, our products are made up of powerful herbs that gets rid of any impurities in the vaginal/reproductive area. Our products are known to get rid of foul vaginal odor, reoccurring bacteria vaginosis, reoccurring yeast infections, tightening the vagina, Bring back natural moisture when you turn to get a little dry down there, boost your sex drive, boost fertility, relieve stress and anxiety. Get rid of or decrease the size of cysts , Endometriosis and fibroids, get rid of cramps during your menstrual cycle and so much more!
